S10bsu039_u:2_0: ahamevaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi / dharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi / saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
S10bsu039_u:3_1_0: namo vajra(sāra)pramardine / namo ratnārciṣe / namo nāgeśvararājāya / namo vīrasenāya /
S10bsu039_u:3_1_1: namo vīranandine / namo ratnāgnaye / namo ratnacandraprabhāya / namo 'moghadarśine /
S10bsu039_u:3_1_2: namo ratnacandrāya / namo nirmalāya / namaḥ śūradattāya / namo brahmaṇe / namo brahmadattāya /
S10bsu039_u:3_1_3: namo varūṇāya / namo varuṇadevāya / namo bhadraśriye / namaścandanaśriye / namo 'nantaujase /
S10bsu039_u:3_1_4: namaḥ prabhāsaśriye / namo 'śokaśriye / namo nārāyaṇāya / namaḥ kusumaśriye / namo
S10bsu039_u:3_3: namo ghanaśriye / namaḥ smṛtiśriye / namaḥ suparikīrtitanāmadheyaśriye /
S10bsu039_u:3_5: namo ratnapadmavikrāmiṇe / namo ratnapadmasupratiṣṭhitaśailendrarājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
S10bsu039_u:4_0: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ daśadikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatāarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S10bsu039_u:4_2: yanmayā asyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣu anavarāgre jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syātkāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet,
S10bsu039_u:4_3: staupikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtaṃ syāt,
S10bsu039_u:4_4: hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet /
S10bsu039_u:4_5: pancānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vā anumoditāni bhaveyuḥ /
S10bsu039_u:4_7_0: pare vā samādāpitāḥ syurvartamānā vā anumoditā bhaveyuryena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto 'haṃ
S10bsu039_u:4_7_1: nirayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu
S10bsu039_u:4_7_2: mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyeyamindriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃmithyādṛṣṭiṃ
S10bsu039_u:4_8: tatsarvaṃkarmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ cakṣurbhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatamagrataḥ pratideśayāmi,
S10bsu039_u:5_0: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yanmayā asyāṃ jātāvanyāsu vā jātiṣvanavarāgre vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavedantaśastiryagyonigatāyāpyālopaḥ,
S10bsu039_u:5_1: śīlaṃ vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yacca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlam,
S10bsu039_u:5_4: tatsarvamaikadhyaṃ piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā abhisaṃkṣipya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā (gurugurūṇā) pariṇāmanayā,
S10bsu039_u:5_6: yathā pariṇāmayanti etarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ tathā hamapi pariṇāmayāmi /
S10bsu039_u:7_0: ye cābhyatītāstathapi ca ye anāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /
